example.parse: (PREP فِي) (NP (NOUN عَهْد) (NP (NP (NOUN_PROP عَبْد) (DET+NOUN_PROP الناصِر)) (CONJ وِ) (NP (NP-TMP (NOUN بَعْد) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه))) (DET+NOUN_PROP السادات))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS ظَهَرِت) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG قُوَّة) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL المَصْرِيِّين)) (CONJ وَ) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG إِسْتِماتَت) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3P هِم)) (PP-CLR (PREP فِي) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN الدِفاع)) (PP (PREP عَن) (NP (NOUN أَراضِي) (NP (POSS_PRON_3P هِم)))))))))))
